alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cherokee; Cleburne; Etowah; St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:23PM CDT until July 21 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Talladega County in east central Alabama... Calhoun County in east central Alabama... Eastern Etowah County in northeastern Alabama... Central St. Clair County in central Alabama... North central Cleburne County in east central Alabama... Southern Cherokee County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 423 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Western Weiss Lake to near Hokes Bluff to near Ashville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Anniston, Oxford, Pell City, Jacksonville, Rainbow City, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, Centre, Cedar Bluff, Forney, West End-Cobb Town, Centre Municipal Airport, Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Lincoln, Glencoe, Weaver and Ashville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
